aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.firstParagraph: OOO Spetsresurs is a dynamically developing cable plant. Our main specialization is the production of fire-resistant cable for fire protection systems. We also manufacture heating wire (concrete heating), telephony, video surveillance.
aboutUs.secondParagraph: We have assembled a team of qualified professionals in the electrical goods market to implement a key mission: saving people's lives by manufacturing high-tech and environmentally friendly cable and wire products that meet all operating and safety standards.
aboutUs.thirdParagraph: The main principles of the company are: honest business practices, an individual approach to each client, affordable cable prices, and control over every stage of production.
aboutUs.fourthParagraph: Caring about the quality of our products, we purchase raw materials only from large suppliers of copper, steel, and plastic.
aboutUs.fifthParagraph: Our own laboratory and multi-stage quality control ensure that the products comply with GOST standards.

contractor-rules.title: Requirements for contractors
contractor-rules.description: In order to implement LLC 'Spetsresurs' the rights granted by Article 312 of the Civil Code of the Russian Federation, the evidence that the conclusion of the supply contract and the execution of its obligations, in the form of subsequent execution and realization of transactions, is accepted by the person authorized to sign, we kindly ask you to provide properly certified copies of the following documents with a stamp.
contractor-rules.document3: Extract from the Unified State Register of Legal Entities (EGRUL)/Individual Entrepreneurs (EGRIP);
contractor-rules.document4: Lease agreement at the actual location;
contractor-rules.document5: Decision on appointment to the position of the head (protocol of the general meeting of participants or board of directors (shareholders) or the decision of the sole participant (founder, shareholder));
contractor-rules.document6: Order on appointment to the position of the head;
contractor-rules.document7: Copy of the passport of the head;
contractor-rules.document8: Order or power of attorney for persons authorized to sign contracts and invoices.

payment-rules.title: Payment Terms
payment-rules.paragraph1: Payment is made only via bank transfer.
payment-rules.paragraph2: Product shipment is carried out upon 100% advance payment. You can always confirm the amount, terms, and payment procedure with your personal manager.
payment-rules.paragraph3: Please note that after the expiration of the specified period on the invoice, the price and availability of products in stock may change. Before paying an invoice with an expired term, please call your manager and ask them to reissue the invoice with updated details. Partial payment invoices are not accepted.

storage-rules.title: Storage Conditions
storage-rules.paragraph2: We offer the service of free storage at our warehouse.
storage-rules.paragraph3: Free storage is available for up to 10 days inclusive from the date of payment. After this period, you can use the delivery service or pick up the product yourself.
storage-rules.paragraph4: By purchasing the product in advance, you can be sure that all the necessary materials will be available on time, and by using the free storage service, you won’t have to worry about where to temporarily store the product.
